description: Notify modification of global PM enable switches.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD SHE-VOIP-CTRL-MIB::sheVoipPmGlobalParamModified SHE-VOIP-CTRL-MIB::sheVoipPmGlobalParamControlTimeStamp u 9999 SHE-VOIP-CTRL-MIB::sheVoipPmEnableCall i 1 SHE-VOIP-CTRL-MIB::sheVoipPmEnableRTP i 1 SHE-VOIP-CTRL-MIB::sheVoipPmEnablePort i 1 SHE-VOIP-CTRL-MIB::sheVoipPmEnableMegaco i 1 SHE-VOIP-CTRL-MIB::sheVoipPmMaxRecordNumForShortInterval u 1 SHE-VOIP-CTRL-MIB::sheVoipPmShortTimeInterval i 1 SHE-VOIP-CTRL-MIB::sheVoipPmMaxRecordNumForLongInterval u 1 SHE-VOIP-CTRL-MIB::sheVoipPmEnableCallForLongInterval i 1 SHE-VOIP-CTRL-MIB::sheVoipPmEnableRTPForLongInterval i 1 SHE-VOIP-CTRL-MIB::sheVoipPmEnablePortForLongInterval i 1 SHE-VOIP-CTRL-MIB::sheVoipPmEnableMegacoForLongInterval i 1

description: The time stamp of the last command (end of command).
variables.name: SHE-VOIP-CTRL-MIB::sheVoipPmGlobalParamControlTimeStamp

description: Enable/disable PM function for call counter set for short interval.
Value Type: Enable(1), Disable(2);
Default: enabled(1)
Usage modified with R4.7M.
variables.name: SHE-VOIP-CTRL-MIB::sheVoipPmEnableCall

description: Enable/disable PM function for Rtp counter set for short interval.
Value Type: Enable(1), Disable(2);
Default: enabled(1)
Usage modified with R4.7M.
variables.name: SHE-VOIP-CTRL-MIB::sheVoipPmEnableRTP

description: Enable/disable PM function for port counter set for short interval.
Value Type: Enable(1), Disable(2);
Default: enabled(1)
Usage modified with R4.7M.
variables.name: SHE-VOIP-CTRL-MIB::sheVoipPmEnablePort

description: Enable/disable PM function for megaco counter set for short interval.
Value Type: Enable(1), Disable(2);
Default: enabled(1)
Usage modified with R4.7M.
notes: this node is special for H248 and not supported by SIP.
variables.name: SHE-VOIP-CTRL-MIB::sheVoipPmEnableMegaco

description: Max history record num configure for Performance management for short interval.
The used timebase for short interval depends on the TimeInterval setting.
variables.name: SHE-VOIP-CTRL-MIB::sheVoipPmMaxRecordNumForShortInterval

description: Performance management Time Interval for short intervals.
When this counter collect interval timer expires, start to collect the counter values
of the enable counter-set and save them into history data record.
NOTE:
R3.8M accept only fifteenMinutes(3) !!
variables.name: SHE-VOIP-CTRL-MIB::sheVoipPmShortTimeInterval

description: Max history record num configure for long interval type.
NOTE:
R3.8M support only 'oneDay'as long interval!!
variables.name: SHE-VOIP-CTRL-MIB::sheVoipPmMaxRecordNumForLongInterval

description: Enable/disable PM function for call counter set for long interval.
Value Type: Enable(1), Disable(2);
Default: disabled(1)
New with R4.7M.
variables.name: SHE-VOIP-CTRL-MIB::sheVoipPmEnableCallForLongInterval

description: Enable/disable PM function for Rtp counter set for long interval.
Value Type: Enable(1), Disable(2);
Default: disabled(1)
New with R4.7M.
variables.name: SHE-VOIP-CTRL-MIB::sheVoipPmEnableRTPForLongInterval

description: Enable/disable PM function for port counter set for long interval.
Value Type: Enable(1), Disable(2);
Default: disabled(1)
New with R4.7M.
variables.name: SHE-VOIP-CTRL-MIB::sheVoipPmEnablePortForLongInterval

description: Enable/disable PM function for megaco counter set for long interval.
Value Type: Enable(1), Disable(2);
Default: disabled(1)
New with R4.7M.
notes: this node is special for H248 and not supported by SIP.
variables.name: SHE-VOIP-CTRL-MIB::sheVoipPmEnableMegacoForLongInterval

description: Notify MSAN-based RTP counters are updated successfully.
So now operators can get the latest counter value of MSAN-based RTP counters.

event.Summary: MSAN based RTP counters updated successfully

description: The request of a user command:
updateMSANBasedRTPCounter (29): [NO_CONFIG-CHANGE]
Must:
sheVoipPmMSANBasedControlTimeIntervalType.
Notes:
Because to get MSAN-based RTP counter is a long-command, this command just notify MSAN
to start to collect the latest MSAN-based RTP counter.
When sheVoipPmMSANBasedRTPCounterSuccessTrap or sheVoipPmMSANBasedRTPCounterFailTrap
is received, means that MSAN-based RTP counter collection finished and operator can
get the latest MSAN-based RTP counter.
variables.name: SHE-VOIP-CTRL-MIB::sheVoipPmMSANBasedControlRequest

description: The time stamp of the last command (end of command).
variables.name: SHE-VOIP-CTRL-MIB::sheVoipPmMSANBasedControlTimeStamp

description: The result of the last user command.
variables.name: SHE-VOIP-CTRL-MIB::sheVoipPmMSANBasedControlReqResult

description: Notify MSAN-based RTP counters fail to update the values.

event.Summary: MSAN based RTP counters failed to update

description: The request of a user command:
updateMSANBasedRTPCounter (29): [NO_CONFIG-CHANGE]
Must:
sheVoipPmMSANBasedControlTimeIntervalType.
Notes:
Because to get MSAN-based RTP counter is a long-command, this command just notify MSAN
to start to collect the latest MSAN-based RTP counter.
When sheVoipPmMSANBasedRTPCounterSuccessTrap or sheVoipPmMSANBasedRTPCounterFailTrap
is received, means that MSAN-based RTP counter collection finished and operator can
get the latest MSAN-based RTP counter.
variables.name: SHE-VOIP-CTRL-MIB::sheVoipPmMSANBasedControlRequest

description: The time stamp of the last command (end of command).
variables.name: SHE-VOIP-CTRL-MIB::sheVoipPmMSANBasedControlTimeStamp

description: The result of the last user command.
variables.name: SHE-VOIP-CTRL-MIB::sheVoipPmMSANBasedControlReqResult

description: Notify port-based RTP counters are updated successfully.
So now operators can get the latest counter value of port-based RTP counters.

event.Summary: Port based RTP counters updated successfully

description: The request of a user command:
updatePortBasedRTPCounter (30): [NO_CONFIG-CHANGE]
Must:
sheVoipPmPortBasedControlIfIndex
sheVoipPmPortBasedControlIntervalType.
Notes:
Because to get Port-based RTP counter is a long-command, this command just notify Port
to start to collect the latest Port-based RTP counter.
When sheVoipPmPortBasedRTPCounterSuccessTrap or sheVoipPmPortBasedRTPCounterFailTrap
is received, means that Port-based RTP counter collection finished and operator can
get the latest Port-based RTP counter.
variables.name: SHE-VOIP-CTRL-MIB::sheVoipPmPortBasedControlRequest

description: The time stamp of the last command (end of command).
variables.name: SHE-VOIP-CTRL-MIB::sheVoipPmPortBasedControlTimeStamp

description: The result of the last user command.
variables.name: SHE-VOIP-CTRL-MIB::sheVoipPmPortBasedControlReqResult

description: Notify Port-based RTP counters fail to update the values.

event.Summary: Port based RTP counters failed to update

description: The request of a user command:
updatePortBasedRTPCounter (30): [NO_CONFIG-CHANGE]
Must:
sheVoipPmPortBasedControlIfIndex
sheVoipPmPortBasedControlIntervalType.
Notes:
Because to get Port-based RTP counter is a long-command, this command just notify Port
to start to collect the latest Port-based RTP counter.
When sheVoipPmPortBasedRTPCounterSuccessTrap or sheVoipPmPortBasedRTPCounterFailTrap
is received, means that Port-based RTP counter collection finished and operator can
get the latest Port-based RTP counter.
variables.name: SHE-VOIP-CTRL-MIB::sheVoipPmPortBasedControlRequest

description: The time stamp of the last command (end of command).
variables.name: SHE-VOIP-CTRL-MIB::sheVoipPmPortBasedControlTimeStamp

description: The result of the last user command.
variables.name: SHE-VOIP-CTRL-MIB::sheVoipPmPortBasedControlReqResult
